commands.value: Make sure to follow me on Twitch to be notified when I go live so you can come and watch my Euphoric streams.
Shut up, Paul.
For he is the king. For he is the chosen one.. For he is.. JAROOL!
I've been smoking too much of that dank twix.
Don't ask about the sleeping pattern, it's messed up - I nap wayyyyyy too much.
No, at this time you cannot join Mindcrack as it is a whitelisted private server. Sorry about that.
Gotta go fast!
Game Theoryyyy!
Feel free to tip to get me better internet: https://streamtip.com/t/pyropuncher
Coebot is love. Coebot is life. Coebot is a robot.
My twitter is: http://www.twitter.com/pyrao - Go follow me!
Do you have a moment to talk about our lord and Saviour, Lord Baj? No? Me neither. :D
Do you feel Euphoric m8? Well, do you?
I now have a subscription button, for $4.99 where you can get a bunch of cool stuff including emotes (at some point in the future).
It's Guude's bong! I mean.. tobbaco smoking water pipe!

I also exist in other places | I tweet - http://www.twitter.com/pyrao | I post on Facebook -  http://www.facebook.com/pyropuncher | and I post videos on youtube daily - http://www.youtube.com/pyropuncher | Go Follow, Like and Subscribe! It helps me out a lot!
I also have a Facebook page - like it up: http://www.facebook.com/pyropuncher
IT MEEEEEEEEEEEE!
Paul is currently busy with his m8s, editing a video, shouting at Pearse or sorting out his internet/computer. Or all of the above. Please be patient, he will be back soon.
All give praise to Danky Kang for he shall bestow great wonders (and bananas) upon us!

autoReplies.response: Pyro is currently playing (_STEAM_GAME_) which can be found at (_STEAM_STORE_)
No, you cannot currently join Mindcrack, sorry about that.
Yes, Pyro is living at home and the only room available for recording is this closet.
Please keep discussion of The PlayMindCrack situation to /r/mindcrack or /r/playmindcrack
Guys, please stop bringing this up, do it again and face a ban.
